metadata.title: CVE-2021-45451 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: In Mbed TLS before 3.1.0, psa_aead_generate_nonce allows policy bypass or oracle-based decryption when the output buffer is at memory locations accessible to an untrusted application.

criterions.comment: mbedtls package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
